title: Basmati Pilaf with Tikka Griddled Chicken
ingredients: ['4 small skinless chicken breast fillets, about 125g each', '1 fat garlic clove, chopped', '1 tbsp tikka spice mix or mild curry powder', '2 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 onion, sliced', '250g basmati rice, rinsed', '600ml hot vegetable or chicken stock, made with stock cubes', '50g raisins', '1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '100g cherry tomatoes, halved', '25g toasted pine nuts', 'lemon wedges, to serve']
